message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth every penny. We're offering it to you today for $100. This is a special opportunity to own a product that's worth $120 to you, and we're confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let us know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase.
